DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to test both user preference and speed of targeting with the use of the Acessa System with Targeting Animation Guidance (TAG).
DOC.brief_title: Post Market Evaluation of Acessa With TAG
DOC.detailed_description: The intent of the TAG system is to assist the gynecologist in getting the tip of the Acessa Handpiece to the fibroid by creating an animated image overlay of the movements and placement. The study will be conducted in two parts: Part 1: User Preference Testing - users will be presented with various statements pertaining to the features of the system and asked to indicate their degree of agreement. Part 2: Time to target - will be measure by fibroid.
DOC.criteria: Women who: Are planning to undergo the Acessa procedure Are willing and able to comply with all procedures Are capable of providing informed consent Women who: In the medical judgement of the investigator should not participate in this study
